articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Spirit and Frontier Airlines plan to merge - CNN
articles.description: Spirit and Frontier Airlines on Monday announced a $6.6 billion merger, a combination of low-fare carriers that would create America's fifth-largest airline.

articles.author: Alex Prewitt
articles.title: For Married Pairs of Ex-Players, the U.S.–Canada Women’s Hockey Rivalry Is Uniquely Complicated - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Olympics stir up more than the ordinary border battle for the three couples of former American and Canadian athletes, who have bridged the divide of the intense U.S. and Canada women's hockey rivalry to build lives together away from the ice.
articles.content: BEIJING — When the puck drops here Tuesday afternoon on the latest edition of the Winter Olympics’ fiercest rivalry, former United States captain Meghan Duggan will be parked behind a computer at her… [+7773 chars]

articles.author: Kelly Kimball
articles.title: Review: ‘Fabulous Filipino Brothers’ explores complexity — and secret beauty — of otherness - SF Chronicle Datebook
articles.description: The directorial debut of Bay Area native Dante Basco unravels a warm, comedic and kaleidoscopic experience of being Filipino in America.

articles.title: Researchers race to study probiotic before white nose syndrome spreads to B.C. bats - CBC.ca
articles.description: Researchers say a deadly fungus that has nearly wiped out a North American bat species hasn't yet spread to British Columbia, giving them valuable time to study whether probiotics prevent the disease.
articles.content: Researchers say a deadly fungus that has nearly wiped out a North American bat species hasn't yet spread to British Columbia, giving them valuable time to study whether probiotics prevent the disease… [+3647 chars]
